conan
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which conan installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using conan, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load conan/1.60.2-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
